S06pvspl_u:3_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate
S06pvspl_u:3_1: mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair bhikṣusahasrais sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair
S06pvspl_u:3_2: niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ
S06pvspl_u:3_5: ca sārdhaṃ sarvair dṛṣṭadharmair anekaiś ca bodhisatvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ
S06pvspl_u:4_0: tadyathā badhrapālena ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena ratnākareṇa ca susārthavāhena ca
S06pvspl_u:4_1: naradattena ca varuṇadattena ca guhaguptena ca indradattena ca uttaramatinā ca viśeṣamatinā
S06pvspl_u:4_2: ca vardhamānamatinā ca amoghadarśinā ca susaṃprasthitena ca suvikrāntavikrāmiṇa ca
S06pvspl_u:4_3: nityodyuktena ca nityaprayuktena ca anikṣiptadhureṇa ca sūryagarbheṇa ca anupamamatinā
S06pvspl_u:4_4: ca avalokiteśvareṇa ca mahāsthāmaprāptena ca mañjuśriyā ca vajramatinā ca ratnamudrāhastena
S06pvspl_u:4_5: ca nityotkṣiptahastena ca maitreyeṇa ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena //
S06pvspl_u:6: atha khalu bhagavān svayam eva siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapya nyaṣīdat paryaṅkam ābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhānyā (PvSPL kā_a)
S06pvspl_u:7_0: abhūvan* sarvakṣaṇāś cāstamitā abhūvan* ye ca satvās tābhyo nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyaś
S06pvspl_u:7_1: cyutās te sarve devamanuṣyeṣūpapadyante sma te devamanuṣyeṣūpapannā bhagavata evānubhāvena
S06pvspl_u:7_2: pūrvajanmāny anusmaranti sma anusmṛtya tenaiva prītiprāmodyena svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu
S06pvspl_u:7_3: ye buddhā bhagavantas teṣām antikam upasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
S06pvspl_u:7_4: pādavandanāṅ kṛtvā sarve prāñjalayo bhūtvā tān buddhān bhagavato namasyanti sma //
S06pvspl_u:8_0: atha khalu tenaiva kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau
S06pvspl_u:8_1: andhās satvās te cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma vadhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdāñ cchṛṇvanti
S06pvspl_u:8_2: sma unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabhante sma vikṣiptacittā ekāgracittā bhavanti sma nagnāś
S06pvspl_u:8_3: cīvaraprāvṛtā bhavanti sma jighatsitāḥ pūrṇagātrā bhavanti sma tṛṣitāḥ vigatapipāsā
S06pvspl_u:8_4: bhavanti sma rogaspṛṣṭāḥ vigatarogā bhavanti sma hīnendriyāḥ paripūrṇendriyā bhavanti
S06pvspl_u:8_6: bhavanti sma sarvasatvāś ca mātāpitṛsamacittā bhavanti sma bhrātṛbhaginī samacittā
S06pvspl_u:8_7: mitrāmātyajñātisālohitasamacittā daśakuśalakarmapathasevinaś ca bhavanti sma brahmacāriṇaḥ
S06pvspl_u:8_8: śucayo nirāmagandhāḥ sarvasukhasamarpitā īdṛśasukhaṃ pratilabhante sma tadyathāpi
S06pvspl_u:8_9: nāma tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya tasminn eva ca samaye evaṃrūpayā prajñāya samanvāgatā
S06pvspl_u:8_10: bhavanti sma yad anyabuddhakṣetrasthā buddhā bhagavanta evam udānam udānayanti sma
S06pvspl_u:8_11: sādhu damaḥ sādhu śamaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu cīrṇo brahmacaryavāsaḥ sādhu praṇibhūteṣv avihiṃseti //
S06pvspl_u:9_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva sihāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ iman trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum
S06pvspl_u:9_1: abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca pūrvasyān
S06pvspl_u:9_2: diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adha-ūrdhvavidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikopamāl lokadhātūn
S06pvspl_u:9_3: abhibhūya tathāgatas tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca //
S06pvspl_u:10_0: tadyathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvvaparvatān abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati
S06pvspl_u:10_1: virocate ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca evam eva bhagavān sarvalokadhātūn abhibhūya
S06pvspl_u:10_2: tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca //
S06pvspl_u:11: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yādṛk trisāhsaramahāsāhsre lokadhātau satvānām ātmabhāvas tatsamānam ātmabhāvaṃ prākṛtam upadarśayāmāsa //
S06pvspl_u:14_0: devā brahmakāyikāś ca paranirmitavaśavartinaś ca nirmāṇaratayaś ca tuṣitāś ca yāmāś
S06pvspl_u:14_1: ca trāyastriṃśāś ca cāturmahārājakāyikāś ca devās te tan tathāgatasyāsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ
S06pvspl_u:14_3: ca gṛhītvā divyāni cotpalakumudasaugandhikapundarīkapadmāni gṛhītvā divyāni ca kesaratamālapatrāṇi
S06pvspl_u:14_4: gṛhītvā yena sa tathāgatasyāsecanaka ātmabhāvas tenopasaṃkrāntā ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre
S06pvspl_u:14_5: lokadhātau manuṣyās te pi tan tathāgatasyāsecanakam ātmabhāvan dṛṣṭvā sthalajajalajāni
S06pvspl_u:14_6: puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena sa tathāgatasyāsecanaka ātmabhāvas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ //
S06pvspl_u:15_0: atha khalu te devās te ca manuṣyās tābhir divyābhiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatraddhvajapatākābhis
S06pvspl_u:15_1: te sthalajajalajaiḥ puṣpais tan tathāgatakāyam avakiranti smābhyavakiranti sma abhiprakiranti sma //
S06pvspl_u:16_1: sthajajalajaiś ca puṣpair bhagavān avakīrṇas tāni sarvāny uparyantarīkṣe bhagavato
S06pvspl_u:16_3: tataś ca kūṭāgārād divyāni puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni lambante sma pralambante sma abhipralambante
S06pvspl_u:16_4: sma taiś ca puṣpadāmabhiḥ paṭṭadāmabhiś cāyan trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur atīva
S06pvspl_u:16_5: śobhate sma tena ca suvarṇavarṇena bhagavataḥ prabhāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu pravisṛtena
S06pvspl_u:16_6: ekaikasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan* asmiṃś
S06pvspl_u:16_7: ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvacāturdvīpikeṣu lokadhātuṣu devamanuṣyānām*
S06pvspl_u:16_8: ekaikasyaitad abhūt* mama puratas tathāgato niṣiṇṇo dharman deśayati mama puratas
S06pvspl_u:17_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ punar api smitam akarot* yena
S06pvspl_u:17_1: smitāvabhāsenāyan trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sphuṭo bhūt* yāvad daśasu dikṣu
S06pvspl_u:17_2: gaṅgānadīvālikopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan* ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau
S06pvspl_u:17_3: satvāḥ te pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti
S06pvspl_u:17_4: sma saśrāvakasaṃghāṃs tatra ca pūrvasyān diśi
S06pvspl_u:18_0: (PvSPL ki_a) gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye satvās te pīmāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ
S06pvspl_u:18_1: paśyanti sma śākyamuniñ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi
S06pvspl_u:18_2: paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣv adha-ūrdhvandigbhāge gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
S06pvspl_u:18_3: buddhān bhagavantaḥ paśyanti sma saśrāvakasaṃghāṃs teṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye satvās
S06pvspl_u:18_4: te pīmāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma śākyamuniñ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena //
S06pvspl_u:19_0: atha khalu pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopamāl lokadhātūn atikramya tebhyo yā sarvapaścimā
S06pvspl_u:19_1: lokadhātū ratnāvatī nāma tatra ratnākaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas tiṣṭhati
S06pvspl_u:19_2: dhriyate yāpayati sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisatvānān deśayati atha tatra lokadhātau
S06pvspl_u:19_3: samantaraśmir nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsan dṛṣṭvā tañ ca mahāntaṃ
S06pvspl_u:19_4: pṛthivīcālan tañ ca bhagavato secanakam atmabhāvan dṛṣṭvā yena sa bhagavān ratnākaras
S06pvspl_u:19_5: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādāv
S06pvspl_u:19_6: abhivandya taṃ bhagavantaṃ ratnākaran tathāgatam etad avocat* ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ
S06pvspl_u:19_7: pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasyāsya
S06pvspl_u:20_0: evam ukte sa bhagavān ratnākaras tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisatvam etad avocat*
S06pvspl_u:20_1: asti kulaputretaḥ paścime digbhāge gaṅgānadīvālikopamāl lokadhātūn atikramya sahā
S06pvspl_u:20_2: nāma lokadhātus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato rhan samyaksambuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate
S06pvspl_u:20_3: yāpayate sa bodhisatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā saṃprakāśayati tasyām īdṛśo 'nubhāvaḥ //
S06pvspl_u:21_0: atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisatvo ratnākaran tathāgatam etad avocat* gamiṣyāmy
S06pvspl_u:21_1: ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātun taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamunin tathāgatam arhantaṃ
S06pvspl_u:21_2: samyaksambuddhan darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisatvān mahāsatvāṇ
S06pvspl_u:21_4: darśanāya sa bhagavān āha gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasedānīṅ kālaṃ manyase //
S06pvspl_u:22_0: atha khalu ratnākaras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi
S06pvspl_u:22_1: padmāni samantaraśmaye bodhisatvāya prādād evañ cāvādīd etais tvaṃ kulaputra padmais
S06pvspl_u:22_2: saparivāras taṃ śākyamunin tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ evañ ca vadeḥ ratnākaro bhagavān*
S06pvspl_u:22_3: bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṃkatāṃ laghusamutthānatāṃ (PvSPL ki_b)
S06pvspl_u:23_0: yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchatīmāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa
S06pvspl_u:23_2: padmāni prahitāni bhagavata iti saṃprajānaṅkārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra tatra buddhakṣetre
S06pvspl_u:23_3: bhaves taṅ kasya hetor durāsadā hi te kulaputra bodhisatvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapannāḥ //
S06pvspl_u:24_0: atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisatvas tasya ratnākarasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt tāni
S06pvspl_u:24_1: nānāratnamayāni padmāni gṛhītvā suvarṇāvabhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇy anekair bodhisatvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrair
S06pvspl_u:24_2: gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitair dārakair dārikābhiś ca parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ pūrvasyān diśi
S06pvspl_u:24_3: teṣu gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu buddhān bhagavatas satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan
S06pvspl_u:24_5: sahā lokadhātus tena saṃprāptaḥ yena ca śākyamunis tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas
S06pvspl_u:24_6: tenopasaṃkrāmat upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandyaikānte 'sthād ekānte
S06pvspl_u:24_7: sthitaś ca samantaraśmir bodhisatvo bhagavantaṃ śākyamunin tathāgatam etad avocat*
S06pvspl_u:24_8: ratnākaro bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṃkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ
S06pvspl_u:24_9: yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāñ ca paripṛcchatīmāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa
S06pvspl_u:24_10: tathāgatena nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni prahitāni bhagavataḥ //
S06pvspl_u:25_0: atha khalu bhagavāñ cchākyamunis tathāgatas tāni padmāni gṛhītvā yena te pūrvasyān
S06pvspl_u:25_1: diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopamā lokadhātavas tena prākṣipat taiś ca padmais te lokadhātavaḥ
S06pvspl_u:25_2: sphuṭā abhūvan* teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇṇakās teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu dharman
S06pvspl_u:25_3: deśayanti sma yad utemam eva prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ yaiś ca satvais sa dharmaś
S06pvspl_u:25_4: śrutas te sarve niyatā abhūvann anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau //
S06pvspl_u:26_0: atha khalu ye te bodhisatvā mahāsatvā gṛhasthāḥ pravrajitāś ca dārakā dārikāś ca
S06pvspl_u:26_1: tato ratnāvatyā lokadhātos samantaraśminā bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sārdham āyātās
S06pvspl_u:26_2: te svakasvakaiḥ kuśalamūlair bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya saṃmānya saṃpūjya
S06pvspl_u:26_3: pādau śirasābhivandyaikānte nyasīdan* ekāntaniṣannāś ca te gṛhasthās te ca pravrajitās
S06pvspl_u:26_4: te ca dārakās tāś ca dārikā bhagavantaṃ śākyamunin tathāgatam etad avocan* ratnākaro
S06pvspl_u:26_5: bhagavāṃs tathāgataḥ bhagavato 'lpabādhātāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṃkatāṃ laghusamutthānatāṃ
S06pvspl_u:26_6: yātrāṃ balaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāñ ca paripṛcchati imāni ca tena bhagavatā ratnākareṇa
S06pvspl_u:26_7: tathāgatena padmāni preṣitāni bhagavataḥ atha khalu bhagavāñ cchākyamunis tathāgatas
S06pvspl_u:27_0: manasikārād evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyabhijñājñānasākṣātkriyā
S06pvspl_u:27_1: dānam abhinirharati sa divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa satvān paśyati
S06pvspl_u:27_2: cyavamānān upapadyamānān suvarṇān durvarṇān hīnān praṇītān sugatān durgatān yathākarmopagān
S06pvspl_u:27_3: satvān yathābhūtaṃ prajānāty amī bhavantas satvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā vāgduścaritena
S06pvspl_u:27_4: samanvāgatā manoduścaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām apavādakā mithyādṛṣṭayas te mithyādṛṣṭikarmasamādānahetoḥ
S06pvspl_u:27_5: kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātan narakeṣūpapadyante amī punar bhavantas
S06pvspl_u:27_6: satvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatā vāksucaritena manaḥsucaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām
S06pvspl_u:27_7: anapavādakās samyagdṛṣṭikās te samyagdṛṣṭikarmasamādānahetoḥ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ
S06pvspl_u:27_8: maraṇāt sugatau svargaloka upapadyanta iti divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa
S06pvspl_u:27_9: daśa diśi loke ākāśadhātuparyavasāne sarvalokadhātuṣu ṣaḍgatikānāṃ satvānāñ cyutopapādaṃ
S06pvspl_u:27_10: yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti tena ca divyena cakṣuṣā na manyate tathā hi tac cakṣur acakṣur
S06pvspl_u:27_11: acintyatām upādāya yo 'haṃ paśyāmīti na manyate sa tad eva cakṣur nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām
S06pvspl_u:27_12: upādāya svabhāvaviviktatām upādāya svabhāvānutpattikām upādāya sa divyacakṣuścetanām
S06pvspl_u:27_13: api notpādayati na divyacakṣurabhinirhāracetanām anyatra sarvākārajñatāmanasikārād evaṃ hi
S06pvspl_u:28_0: śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran divyacakṣurabhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam
S06pvspl_u:28_1: abhinirharati sa āsravakṣayābhijñāsākṣātkriyājñānam abhinirharati na śrāvakabhūmiṃ
S06pvspl_u:28_2: vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati nāpy anyaṅ kañcid dharmam āśaṃsamāno 'nyatrānuttarāṃ
S06pvspl_u:28_4: na manyate tathā hi taj jñānam ajñānam acintyatām upādāya so 'haṃ prajānāmīti na
S06pvspl_u:28_5: manyate sa tad eva jñānan nopalabhate svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya svabhāvaviviktatām
S06pvspl_u:28_6: upādāya svabhāvopalabdhitām upādāya āsravakṣayajñānacetanām api notādayati nāsravakṣayasākṣātkriyābhijñājñānabhinirhāracetanām
S06pvspl_u:28_7: anyatra sarvākārajñatāmanasikārād evaṃ hi śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ
S06pvspl_u:28_8: caran nāśravakṣayasākṣātkriyābhijñājñānam abhinirharaty evaṃ punaś śāriputra bodhisatvasya
S06pvspl_u:28_9: mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ carataṣ ṣaḍabhijnāḥ paripūrayante pariśuddhyanti cābhijñāḥ
S06pvspl_u:29: santi śāriputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranto dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhanyanti atyantaśūnyatayā (PvSPL kham_b)
S06pvspl_u:31: santi śāriputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ carantaś śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhayanti atyantaśūnyatayā anaddhyāpattitām upādāya //
S06pvspl_u:32: santi śāriputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ carantaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhayanti atyantaśūnyatayā akṣobhaṇatām upādāya //
S06pvspl_u:33_0: santi śāriputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranto vīryapāramitāyāṃ
S06pvspl_u:33_1: sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhayanti atyantaśūnyatayā kāyikacaitasikavīryāsraṃsanatām upādāya //
S06pvspl_u:34: santi śāriputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranto dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhayanti atyantaśūnyatayā avikṣiptacittām upādāya //
S06pvspl_u:35_0: santi śāriputrā bodhisatvā mahāsatvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāñ carantas sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ
S06pvspl_u:35_1: śodhayanti dauṣprajñyacittaparivarjanatām upādāya evaṅ khalu śāriputra bodhisatvā
S06pvspl_u:35_2: mahāsatvāṣ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitvā sarvākārajñatāpanthānañ śodhayanti atyantaśūnyatayā
S06pvspl_u:35_3: agamanānāgamanatām upādāyāparigrahatām upādāya tat kasya hetor dānam āgraham upādāya
S06pvspl_u:35_4: prajñapyate śīlan dauḥśīlyatām upādāya kṣāntir akṣāntim upādāya vīryaṅ kausīdyam
S06pvspl_u:35_5: upādāya samādhir asamāhitatām upādāya prajñā dauṣprajñyam upādāya prajñapyate sa
S06pvspl_u:35_6: tīrṇa iti na manyate atīrṇa iti na manyate dānaṃ mātsaryam iti na manyate śīlan dauḥśīlyam
S06pvspl_u:35_7: iti kṣāntiḥ kṣobha iti vīryaṃ kausīdyam iti samādhir asamāhitateti prajñā duṣprajñateti
S06pvspl_u:35_8: na manyate vindako 'ham iti na manyate satkṛta iti na manyate asatkṛta iti na manyate
S06pvspl_u:35_9: tat kasya hetor na hi śāriputrānutpāda ākṛṣṭo 'ham iti manyate na vandito 'ham iti
S06pvspl_u:35_10: na satkṛto 'ham iti nāsatkṛto 'ham iti manyate tat kasya hetos tathā hi prajñāpāramitā
S06pvspl_u:35_11: sarvamanyanās samucchinattīha śāriputra prajñāpāramitāyāñ carato bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya
S06pvspl_u:35_12: ye guṇā bhavanti na te śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ saṃvidyante //
S06pvspl_u:36: imān guṇān paripūrayan satvānś ca paribhāvayati buddhakṣetrāñ ca pariśodhayati sarvākārajñatāñ cānuprāpnoti //
S06pvspl_u:37_0: punar aparañ śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran sarvasatvānām
S06pvspl_u:37_1: antike samacittatām utpādayati sarvasatvānām antike samacittatām utpādya sarvadharmasamatāṃ
S06pvspl_u:37_2: pratilabhate sarvadharmasamatāṃ pratilabhya tasyāṃ sarvadharmasamatāyāṃ sarvasatvān
S06pvspl_u:37_3: pratiṣṭhāpayati sa dṛṣṭa eva dharme buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ priyo bhavati manaāpaś ca
S06pvspl_u:37_4: sarvabodhisatvānāṃ sarvaśrāvakāṇāṃ sarvapratyekabuddhānāñ ca priyo bhavati manaāpaś
S06pvspl_u:38_0: yatropapadyate tatra tatra na jātu cakṣuṣāmanaāpāni rūpāṇi paśyati na śrotreṇāmanaāpāñ
S06pvspl_u:38_1: cchabdāñ cchṛṇoti na ghrāṇenāmanaāpān gandhāñ jighrati na jihvayāmanaāpān rasān āsvādayati
S06pvspl_u:38_2: na kāyenāmanaāpān sparśān spṛśati na manasāmanaāpān dharmān vijānāti na ca parihīyate
S06pvspl_u:39_0: asmin khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne tataḥ parṣadas trīṇi bhikṣuśatāni
S06pvspl_u:39_1: bhagavantaṃ yathāprāvṛtaiś cīvarair abhicchādayāmāsur anuttarāyāñ ca samyaksambodhau
S06pvspl_u:41_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇañ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S06pvspl_u:41_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratisthāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat
S06pvspl_u:41_2: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāviṣkaraṇāya nāhetukān nāpratyayaṃ buddhā
S06pvspl_u:42_0: bhagavān āha etāny ānanda trīṇi bhikṣuśatāny ekaṣaṣṭitame kalpe mahāketunāmānas tathāgatā
S06pvspl_u:42_1: arhantas samyaksambuddhā loka utpatsyante tārakopame kalpe itaś cyutās santaḥ akṣobḥyasya
S06pvspl_u:42_2: tathāgatasyārhatas samyaksambuddhasya buddhakṣetra upapatsyante abhiratyāṃ lokadhātau
S06pvspl_u:42_3: ṣaṣṭiś ca devaputrasahasrāś cāsyāṃ parṣady anayā dharmadeśanayā paripācitāni maitreyasya
S06pvspl_u:43_0: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavataś śākyamuneḥ parṣanmaṇḍalāc catasraḥ parṣado bhagavato
S06pvspl_u:43_1: 'nubhāvena pūrvasyān diśi buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti sma mahatā buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān
S06pvspl_u:43_2: evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvāyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāyān dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
S06pvspl_u:43_3: paścimottarāyām adha-ūrdhvam ekaikasyān diśi buddhasahasraṃ buddhasahasraṃ paśyanti
S06pvspl_u:43_4: sma mahatā buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhena na ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau tān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān
S06pvspl_u:45_0: atha khalu bhagavataś śākyamuneḥ parṣanmaṇḍalād daśabhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ praṇidhānāni
S06pvspl_u:45_1: kṛtāni vayaṃ bhagavaṃs tāni puṇyāni kariṣyāmo yaiḥ puṇyair eteṣu buddhakṣetreṣūpapatsyāmahaṃ iti //
S06pvspl_u:46_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇām āśayaṃ viditvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitam akarot*
S06pvspl_u:46_1: ānanda āha ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayas smitasya prāviṣkaraṇāya nāhetukan nāpratyayaṃ
S06pvspl_u:47_0: bhagavān āha paśyasi tvam ānandemāni daśa prāṇisahasrāṇi ānanda āha paśyāmi bhagavan
S06pvspl_u:47_1: bhagavān āha etāny ānanda daśa prāṇisahasrāṇītaś cyutāni daśasu dikṣv eteṣu buddhakṣetreṣūpapatsyante
S06pvspl_u:47_2: na ca kadācit tathāgatavirahitā bhaviṣyanti tataḥ paścād vyūharājanāmānas tathāgatā
S06pvspl_u:49_0: āyuṣmāñ ca mahāmaudgalyāyana āyuṣmāñ ca subhūtir āyuṣmāñ ca pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra
S06pvspl_u:49_1: āyuṣmāñ ca mahākāśyapa ete cānye ca sambahulā abhijñātābhijñātā bhikṣavo bodhisatvāś
S06pvspl_u:49_2: ca mahāsatvā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāś ca bhagavantam etad avocan mahāpāramiteyaṃ
S06pvspl_u:49_3: bhagavann udārapāramiteyaṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānān yad uta prajñāpāramitā agrapāramiteyaṃ
S06pvspl_u:49_7: bhagavan bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā atra hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāñ
S06pvspl_u:49_8: caradbhir bodhisatvair mahāsatvair asamasaman dānan dattan tair asamasamā dānapāramitā
S06pvspl_u:49_9: paripūritā tair asamasama ātmabhāvapratilabdhaye samasamasya dharmasya lābhino bhaviṣyanti
S06pvspl_u:50_0: evam asamasamaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntir vīryan dhyānam asamasamā prajñā bhāvitā tair asamasamā
S06pvspl_u:50_1: prajñāpāramitā paripūritā tair asamasama ātmabhāvaḥ pratilabdhas te samasamasya dharmasya
S06pvspl_u:50_2: lābhino bhaviṣyanti yadutānuttarāyās samyaksambodher atraive ca tvaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāñ
S06pvspl_u:50_3: carann asamasamasya rūpasya lābhī jātaḥ asamasamāyā vedanāyās saṃjñāyās saṃskārāṇām
S06pvspl_u:50_4: asamasamasya vijñānasya lābhī jātaḥ asamasamāṃ bodhim abhisambuddho samasaman dharmacakraṃ
S06pvspl_u:50_5: pravartitavān evam atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto 'traiva prajñāpāramitāyāñ
S06pvspl_u:50_7: ca tasmāt tarhi bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṅgantukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
S06pvspl_u:50_8: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaṅkaraṇīyo namaskaraṇīyās te bhagavaṃ bodhisatvā mahāsatvās
S06pvspl_u:51_0: evam ukte bhagavāṃs tān sambahulān mahāśrāvakāṃs tāṃś ca bodhisatvān mahāsatvān etad
S06pvspl_u:51_1: avocad evam etat kulaputrā evam etan namaskaranīyās te bodhisatvā mahāsatvās sadevamānuṣāsureṇa
S06pvspl_u:52_0: tat kasya hetor bodhisatvam* kulaputrā mahāsatvam āgamya manuṣyalokasya loke prādurbhāvo
S06pvspl_u:52_1: bhavaty evan devalokasya kṣatriyamahāsālakulānāṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālakulānān gṛhapatimahāsālakulānāṃ
S06pvspl_u:52_2: rājñāñ cakravartināñ cāturmahārājikānān devānān trāyastriṅśānāṃ yāmānān tuṣitānān
S06pvspl_u:52_4: mahābrahmaṇāṃ parīttābhānām apramāṇābhānām ābhāsvarāṇāṃ parīttaśubhānām (PvSPL ga_a)
S06pvspl_u:53_0: apramāṇaśubhānāṃ śubhakṛtsnānāṃ bṛhatphalānām asaṃjñisatvānāṃ śuddhāvāsānāṃ sudṛśānāṃ
S06pvspl_u:53_1: sudarśanānām aspṛhāṇām atapānām akaniṣṭhānāñ cākāśānantyāyatanopagānāṃ vijñānānantyāyatanopagānām
S06pvspl_u:53_3: bhavati srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhataṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ
S06pvspl_u:53_4: mahāsatvānān tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksambuddhānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati bodhisatvaṃ
S06pvspl_u:53_5: mahāsatvam āgamya trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ yad idaṃ buddharatnasya dharmaratnasya saṃgharatnasya
S06pvspl_u:53_6: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āgamya sarveṣāṃ laukikānāñ jīvitopakaraṇānām
S06pvspl_u:53_8: loke prādurbhāvo bhavati yāvat kulaputrās sarvasukhopadhānānān divyānāṃ mānuṣyakāṇāñ
S06pvspl_u:53_9: ca bhavasukhānān nirvāṇasukhānāñ ca loke prādurbhāvo bhavati sarvas sa kulaputrā
S06pvspl_u:53_10: bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āgamya tat kasya hetos tathā hi kulaputrā bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ
S06pvspl_u:53_11: prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran satvān* ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu niyojayati dānan dāpayati śīle niyuṅkte
S06pvspl_u:53_12: kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayati vīrye niyojayati dhyāne pratiṣṭhāpayati prajñāyāṃ niyojayati
S06pvspl_u:53_13: bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āgamya satvā dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranti
S06pvspl_u:53_14: te dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitāyāñ carantas sarvalaukikalokottarās saṃpattīr
S06pvspl_u:53_15: anuprāpnuvanti tasmāt tarhi kulaputrā bodhisatvo mahāsatvas sarvasatvānāṃ hitasukhāya
S06pvspl_u:54_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāñ jihvendriyaṃ mūkhān nirṇāmyemān trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06pvspl_u:54_1: lokadhātuñ jihvendriyeṇācchādayāmāsa atha khalu tato jihvendriyād anekavarṇā nānānvarṇā
S06pvspl_u:54_2: arciso niścārya pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopamāl lokadhātūn avabhāsayamāsuḥ evan
S06pvspl_u:54_3: dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ pi dikṣv adha-ūrdhvāyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopamāl
S06pvspl_u:55_0: atha khalu pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu lokadhātuṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā bodhisatvā
S06pvspl_u:55_1: mahāsatvās taṃ prabhāvyūhan dṛṣṭvā svakasvasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ
S06pvspl_u:55_2: paripṛcchanti sma kasyāyaṃ bhagavann anubhāvo yenāyam evaṃrūpaḥ prabhāvabhāsas sandṛśyante
S06pvspl_u:55_3: te buddhā bhagavantas tān bodhisatvān mahāsatvān evam āhuḥ eṣa kulaputrāḥ paścime
S06pvspl_u:56: nāma tahāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas tena jihvendriyaṃ mukhān nirṇāmya daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikopamā lokadhātavo mahatāvabhāsena (PvSPL ga_b)
S06pvspl_u:57_0: sphuṭīkṛtā yad uta bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitādeśanāya saṃprakāśanāya
S06pvspl_u:57_1: te bodhisatvā mahāsatvās tāṃs tathāgatān evam āhur gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ
S06pvspl_u:57_2: sahāṃ lokadhātun taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamunin tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksambuddhan
S06pvspl_u:57_3: darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca daśadiksannipatitān bodhisatvān mahāsatvān
S06pvspl_u:57_4: darśanāya tāñ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ śravaṇāya te buddhā bhagavanta evam āhur yasyedānīṃ
S06pvspl_u:57_5: kulaputrāḥ kālaṃ manyaddhva evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣv adha-ūrdhvāyān
S06pvspl_u:57_6: diśi gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu lokadhātuṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā bodhisatvā mahāsatvās taṃ
S06pvspl_u:57_7: prabhāvyūhan dṛṣṭvā svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavantaḥ paripṛcchanti
S06pvspl_u:57_8: sma kasyāyaṃ bhagavann anubhāvo yenāyam evaṃrūpaḥ prabhāvabhāsas sandṛśyate te buddhā
S06pvspl_u:57_9: bhagavantas tān bodhisatvān māhāsatvān evam āhuḥ eṣa kulaputrā adhodigbhāge sahāṃyāṃ
S06pvspl_u:57_10: lokadhātau śākyamunir nāma tāthāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas tena jihvendriyan nirṇāmya
S06pvspl_u:57_11: daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikopamā lokadhātavo mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭīkṛtā yad uta bodhisatvānāṃ
S06pvspl_u:57_12: mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitān deśanāya saṃprakāśanāya te bodhisatvā mahāsatvās tāṃs
S06pvspl_u:57_13: tathāgatān evam āhur gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātun tañ ca bhagavantaṃ
S06pvspl_u:57_14: śākyamunin tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksambuddhan darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya
S06pvspl_u:57_15: tāṃś ca daśadiksannipatitān bodhisatvān mahāsatvān darśanāya vandanāya tāñ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06pvspl_u:57_16: śravaṇāya te buddhā bhagavanta evam āhur yasyedānīṃ kulaputrāḥ kālaṃ manyadhve //
S06pvspl_u:58_0: atha khalu daśabhyo digbhyas te bodhisatvāḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākā
S06pvspl_u:59_0: atha khalu cāturmahārājikā devā yāvad akaniṣṭhā devā divyāni puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇotpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamaṇḍāravakesaratamālapatrāṇi
S06pvspl_u:59_1: gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāman* atha khalu te bodhisatvā mahāsatvās te ca
S06pvspl_u:59_2: devās taiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanais tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksambuddham avakiranti
S06pvspl_u:59_3: sma atha khalu tāni puṣpāṇi viyad abhyudgamyāsya trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokadhātor
S06pvspl_u:59_4: upariṣṭhāt puṣpavitānāṃ saṃsthitañ caturaśrañ ca catusthūṇaṃ samambhāgaśas suvibhaktaṃ
S06pvspl_u:59_5: ramaṇīyaṃ manoramaṃ yat puṣpavitānan dṛṣṭvā tato bodhisatvamahāsatvaparṣado devaparṣadaś
S06pvspl_u:59_6: ca prāṇikoṭinayutaśatasahasreṇānutpattakeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā ta utthāyāsanebhya
S06pvspl_u:59_7: ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgān kṛtvā dakṣiṇāni jānumaṇḍalāni pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs
S06pvspl_u:59_8: tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam etad avocan vayaṃ bhagavann anāgate (PvSPL gā_a)
S06pvspl_u:60_0: 'dhvany evaṃrūpāṇān dharmāṇāṃ lābhino bhavema yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ
S06pvspl_u:60_1: evañ ca śrāvakasaṃghaṃ pariharema evañ ca parṣadi dharman deśayema yathaitarhi tathāgato dharman deśayati //
S06pvspl_u:61_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣān daśadigabhyāgatānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānān teṣāñ ca

S06pvspl_u:62_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam etad avocat
S06pvspl_u:62_2: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratayaḥ smitasya prādurbhāvāya nāhetukan nāpratyayaṃ buddhā
S06pvspl_u:62_3: bhagavanta smitam āviṣkurvanti evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocad
S06pvspl_u:62_5: ete cānāgate 'dhvany aṣṭāṣaṣṭyā kalpakoṭibhir bodhyaṅgapuṣpanāmānas tathāgatā arhantas
S06pvspl_u:63_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyām ayuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa pratibhātu
S06pvspl_u:63_1: te subhūte bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām ārabhya dhārmikīṅ kathāṅ kartuṃ
S06pvspl_u:63_2: yathā bodhisatvā mahāsatvā prajñāpāramitāyāñ caranto niryāyur iti //
S06pvspl_u:64: atha khalu teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānān teṣāñ ca mahāśrāvakāṇān teṣāñ ca devaputrāṇām etad abhavat* //
S06pvspl_u:65: kin nu khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis svakena prajñāpratibhānabalādhānena bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyaty uta buddhānubhāvena //
S06pvspl_u:66_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir buddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānān teṣāñ
S06pvspl_u:66_1: ca mahāśrāvakāṇān teṣāñ ca devaputrāṇāñ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ
S06pvspl_u:66_2: śāriputram etad avocat tat kiñcid āyuṣmañ cchāriputra bhagavataś śrāvakā bhāṣante
S06pvspl_u:66_3: deśayanty udīrayanti sarvas sa tathāgatasya puruṣākāro veditavyas taṅ kasya hetor
S06pvspl_u:66_4: yo hi tathāgatena dharmo deśitas tasyān dharmadeśanāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavataś śrāvakās
S06pvspl_u:66_5: tān dharmatāṃ sākṣātkurvanti tān dharmatāṃ sākṣātkṛtya yad yad eva bhāṣante deśayanty
S06pvspl_u:66_6: upadiśanti sarvan tad dharmatayā na viruddhyate tathāgata evaiṣa śāriputropāyakauśalyayogena
S06pvspl_u:66_7: bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyaty aviṣayo 'trāyuṣmāñ cchāriputra
S06pvspl_u:67_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat* bodhisatvo mahāsatva iti bhagavann
S06pvspl_u:67_1: ucyate kasyaitad bhagavan dharmasyādhivacanaṃ yad uta bodhisatva iti prajñāpāramiteti
S06pvspl_u:67_2: vā nāhaṃ bhagavaṃs tan dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi (PvSPL gā_b)
S06pvspl_u:68_0: yad uta bodhisatva iti prajñāpāramiteti vā so 'haṃ bhagavan bodhisatvam asamanupaśyan
S06pvspl_u:68_1: prajñāpāramitām apy anupalabhamānaḥ katamaṃ bodhisatvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām
S06pvspl_u:69_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocan nāmamātram idaṃ subhūte yad uta
S06pvspl_u:69_1: prajñāpāramiteti bodhisatva iti bodhisatvanāmeti tad api nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā
S06pvspl_u:69_2: nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate tadyathā pi nāma subhūte satvas satva iti nāmnocyate
S06pvspl_u:69_3: na ca kadācit satvopalabdhir yac ca nāma tad dharmaprajñaptimātran tasyāś ca dharmaprajñaptir
S06pvspl_u:70_0: tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate evam ātmasatvajīvajantupoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajanakapaśyakā
S06pvspl_u:70_1: iti subhūte sarvam etad dharmaprajñaptimātran tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo
S06pvspl_u:70_2: na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketanamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātmān na bahirdhā
S06pvspl_u:70_3: nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate evam eva subhūte yad ucyate prajñāpāramiteti bodhisatva
S06pvspl_u:70_4: iti bodhisatvanāmeti sarvam etad dharmaprajñaptimātran tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter
S06pvspl_u:70_5: notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātmān
S06pvspl_u:70_6: na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate tadyathāpi nāma subhūte idam ādhyātmakaṃ
S06pvspl_u:70_7: rūpam iti sarvam etad dharmaprajñaptimātran tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na
S06pvspl_u:70_8: nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā
S06pvspl_u:70_9: nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānam iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram
S06pvspl_u:70_10: etad tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate
S06pvspl_u:70_11: tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate evam eva subhūte yad
S06pvspl_u:70_12: ucyate prajñāpāramiteti bodhisatva iti bodhisatvanāmeti sarvam etan dharmaprajñaptimātran
S06pvspl_u:70_13: tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate
S06pvspl_u:70_14: tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate cakṣur iti subhūte
S06pvspl_u:70_15: dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra
S06pvspl_u:70_16: nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate //
S06pvspl_u:71_0: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mana iti subhūte dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś
S06pvspl_u:71_1: ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra dharmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate
S06pvspl_u:71_2: tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate rūpam iti subhūte
S06pvspl_u:71_3: dharmaprajñaptimātram etat tasyāś ca dharmaprajñapter notpādo na nirodho 'nyatra
S06pvspl_u:71_4: nāmasaṃketamātreṇa vyavahriyate tac ca nāma nādhyātman na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate.
S06pvspl_u:71_5: evaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyan dharma iti subhūte dharmapra
